item.title: Zevia PBC 10-K
item.description: Zevia PBC, which is in the Bottled & Canned Soft Drinks Carbonated Waters [2086] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 11, 2022 had 34651 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 451 instances zevia - 409 instances tax - 345 instances may - 287 instances 2021 - 254 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here

item.title: Zevia PBC S-1
